grtree
Class TreeCanvas

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.awt.Component
        |
        +--java.awt.Canvas
              |
              +--grtree.TreeCanvas
public class TreeCanvas
extends java.awt.Canvas

Canvas on which to paint the tree. Does not work with Panel replacing Canvas. ScrollPane needs to hold a component which is not derived from Container (apparently). The canvas needs to be as large as the tree so that a scrolling container could view ALL of the tree

See Also:
Serialized Form
